tr.td: Take 2 tablets by mouth once daily
Acetominophen Extra Strength 500 mg oral 2 tablets orally once a day.

td.content: May be purchased over the counter. This product contains acetaminophen. Use with caution with any other product containing acetaminophen to prevent possible liver damage.

tr.td: 250 mg Intramuscularly two times a day for 7 days

cefTRIAXone 250 mg injection (2.5 ml of 100 mg/ml solution) injectable 2 times a day Quantity: 1 Refills: 0 Ordered: 8-Jul-2016 Config, SCM Start: 22-Jun-2015 End: 29-Jun-2015 Generic Substitution Allowed

Do not skip doses or discontinue unless directed by your doctor.Keep in refrigerator. Do not freeze.

td.paragraph:
12 day supply of anticoagulants to aid recovery
Tylenol recommended to manage pain. Follow up with Dr. Fleming if this is not working.
Monitor for signs of infection
Patient to follow physical therapy and exercise routine as discussed
Follow up with Dr. Fleming in one month
